programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam – 409 (2021)
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 9 A defendant makes a serious threat in court and pays the price; a teen makes a desperate attempt to escape from the courtroom; a shocking murder committed... by a judge; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam – 410 (2021)
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 10 A teen impersonating a cop takes the law into his own hands; family members of a murdered woman seek revenge in the courtroom; a high speed chase ends with a heated court appearance; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam - 411 (2021)
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 11 A brave survivor confronts the man who murdered her entire family right before her eyes; an explosive confrontation ends with the California Deputy Attorney General removed from court--by force; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam - 412 (2021)
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 12 A tense sentencing hearing explodes into a full-on courthouse brawl; a small town judge has a big-time meltdown; a man sentenced to death for the murder of his wife delivers a surreal and shocking final statement; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam - 413 (2021)
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 13 A daughter testifies against her father, who is accused of murdering her mother; the mystery of a suburban hate crime caught on camera plays out in court; and a defendant attempts to get a judge's attention through any means necessary.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam - 414 (2021)
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 14 A high speed police chase leads to a truly bizarre court appearance; a former courtroom deputy stands trial for murder; prosecutors stage the ultimate courtroom theater using a blood stained bed and a shocking re-enactment; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam - 415 (2021)
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 15 A demonic looking defendant sends a threatening message to a jury; a courtroom officer goes too far; a judge receives a severe sentence for her crimes, proving she's not above the law; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam - 416 (2021)
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 16 A teacher pays a shocking price for an affair with an underage student; a murderer must face the parents of his victims in court; a handcuffed defendant resorts to spitting to send a message; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam - 417 (2021)
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 17 A murder victim's uncle is pushed beyond the breaking point in court; an inmate makes a daring--but poorly executed--escape attempt; a defendant's attack on an unsuspecting deputy leads to decades behind bars; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam - 418 (2021)
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 18 A murderer found guilty of an unthinkable crime holds nothing back at sentencing; a convict attempts to get a judge's attention--through any means necessary; a man breaks into a courthouse at 3am and calls 911 to report... himself.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam - 419 (2021)
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 19 A man accused of murdering his own family decides to defend himself and cross examine his own son; things get heated between a judge and public defender; a stunning act of forgiveness; and more.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Last Call/Road Hazard
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 8 A brutal shooting in Memphis leaves a single mom mourning her only son. The main suspect is a high-ranking gang member. Will his violent reputation keep witnesses from testifying?

programme.title: After the First 48 - A Simple Plan
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 15 In Harris County Texas, a 41-year-old woman is killed in her home by four masked men. Investigators have an idea of who did, but can they get enough evidence to prove it?

programme.title: The First 48: Missing Persons - The Good Student / Left in Danger / Lady On A Bridge
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Detectives Selles Morris, Laura Skrip, and Jim Corcoran team up to search for a straight "A" college student. They uncover surveillance footage that shows the 19-year-old sophomore walking toward the lakefront, then disappearing.

programme.title: The First 48: Missing Persons - 3:10 To Yuma/Harm's Way
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 Detective Pam Childs responds to the disappearance of Maria Miranda reported by Hector, the missing woman's boyfriend and the father of her infant child. Hector explains he received a phone call from Maria in which she complained of being tired.

programme.title: The First 48: Missing Persons - The Graduate
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 Every available detective hits the streets when a talented 30-year-old vanishes on his bicycle, just weeks after earning his second Master's degree. Detective Jim Corcoran must find out whether the missing man could have died in an accident...

programme.title: The First 48: Missing Persons - In the Wind
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 3 When Latashia Nevitt vanishes into thin air on her way to a convenience store, Sgt. Jeffrey Coleman and partner Bill Joyner investigate. But after giving lie detector tests to Latashia's mother and husband and sending canine units on the trail.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Last Call/Road Hazard
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 8 A brutal shooting in Memphis leaves a single mom mourning her only son. The main suspect is a high-ranking gang member. Will his violent reputation keep witnesses from testifying?

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Murder in The Mountains
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 218 The story of the brutal death of Phyllis Murphy, how her family never thought they’d see justice, and how after almost two decades, modern forensic technology eventually led police to her murderer.

programme.title: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen - The Odds Are Murder
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 Poker club owner Paul Horn is gunned down in his apartment. He made some deadly enemies and detectives reveal four suspects, all with the opportunity to murder Paul. Chris Hansen investigates which one took the ultimate gamble and pulled the trigger.

programme.title: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen - Killers Imprint
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 6 After being terrorized and threatened by a friend's partner, Susan Bauer is found murdered in her own home. It appears to be an open and shut case for detectives. Chris Hansen discovers, however, there is much more to this story than first meets the eye.

programme.title: The First 48 - Gangland
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 19 A young man is gunned down at a troubled apartment complex that comes under federal investigation after a rap video goes viral.

programme.title: The First 48 - At Death's Door/Wrong Side Of The Tracks (#10) (2004)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 10 Miami homicide detective Mayree Morin and her team, who find a man who's been shot assassination-style at least a dozen times, must move fast to find the killer before he slips away.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Final Investment
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 When a robbery goes bad in south Memphis, one man is dead and very little physical evidence is left at the scene.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Torched/Girl Fight
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 In Miami, Detective Freddie Ponce arrests a man who tortured and killed his childhood friend. The case is strong--until an unexpected event in the first days of trial puts the whole thing in jeopardy.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Bad Attitude
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 12 After an unidentified man's stabbed body is found in a vacant Dallas, Texas apartment, two suspects both admit to setting up the man for robbery--and blame each other for the murder.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Friends for Life
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 5 In Cleveland Ohio, the body of a dead male is found in the middle of a cold, dark street.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Lured to Death
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 125 A killer stalks and gains his victim’s trust, and investigators keep the case open for almost two decades, until scientific advances allow them to bring the perpetrator to justice.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Good Samaritan
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 201 The Good Samaritan is the story of a ruthless murder and how determined police work and sophisticated forensic techniques eventually solved the case.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Nightclub Nightmare
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 202 The story of Laura Garza’s murder, how her killer was identified and how, two years after her disappearance, investigators got the break they needed after her body was discovered.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Body in the Field
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 203 The tragic story of Mary Ann Perez, and how an extensive cold case investigation utilizing DNA advancements, was finally able to solve her random and horrific murder.

programme.title: Pluto TV True Crime - Pluto TV True Crime
programme.desc: no info available

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - All Our Yesterdays
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 23 Kirk, Spock, and McCoy enter a time portal and get stuck in the past on a planet about to be consumed by a nova.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Turnabout Intruder
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 24 The Enterprise is in danger when Janice Lester, one of Kirk's former lovers, steals his body.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Ensigns of Command
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 149 After a century of silence, the Enterprise receives a message from the Sheliac system informing them that they have discovered a human colony on a world in their sector.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Evolution
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Survivors
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 151 The Enterprise responds to a distress call from Rana IV, a Federation colony that is under attack from an unknown alien ship.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Who Watches the Watchers
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 152 A proto-Vulcan culture worships Captain Picard and prepares to offer Counselor Troi as a sacrifice.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Bonding
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 153 A startling surprise awaits the crew of the Enterprise when a mission costs the life of a crew member, who left her son behind.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Booby Trap
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 154 The Enterprise picks up ancient radio signal code from the ruined planet Aurelius 9, remnants of the total war over 1,000 years ago between Mentaurs and Promelians which caused both races' extinction.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Enemy
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 155 LaForge gets left behind on a storm-plagued planet when the rest of his team encounters a Romulan warrior.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Price
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 156 While the Enterprise hosts negotiations for control of a stable wormhole, Troi forms a personal relationship with an opposing negotiator, unaware of his true being.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Vengeance Factor
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 157 The Enterprise pursues a race of "gatherers" who continue to raid Federation outposts, unaware of the dangers lurking among them.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Defector
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 158 When a Romulan officer defects to the Federation with a warning of an impending invasion, Capt. Picard struggles to decide if he is to be believed.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Hunted
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 159 Investigating a planet applying for membership into the Federation, the crew of the Enterprise finds a group of inhabitants who used to be soldiers but now fight for their very existence.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S4 E9 - A Prefect Murder

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S4 E10 - Coup By Clam
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 10 The crew consume food, sharing amongst themselves. Although if not ingested by the same person, it becomes toxic.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Lifesigns
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 19 The Doctor falls in love with a Vidiian woman stricken by the deadly Phage.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Investigations
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 Neelix helps smoke out the crewmember who has been passing Federation secrets to the Kazon.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Deadlock
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 21 A space anomaly generates a duplicate Voyager and crew, but only one ship can survive an assault by Vidiian invaders.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Innocence
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 22 After crash-landing on a moon, Tuvok encounters three terrified children who claim they've been brought there to die.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Thaw
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 23 Thanks to a complex sensory system controlled by a computer, Kim and others are literally held hostage by fear.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Tuvix
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 24 A bizarre occurrence during transport causes Tuvok and Neelix to fuse into one alien humanoid known as "Tuvix."

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Resolutions
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 25 After contracting a deadly virus, Janeway and Chakotay are forced into exile on a planet that shields them from the effects of the fatal disease.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Basics, Part 1
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 26 Using Chakotay's son as a pawn, Seska lures Voyager into an explosive showdown with the Kazon.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Basics, Part 2
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 While the crew fights for survival on a primitive planet, a lone crewmember battles the Kazon who have taken over the Voyager ship.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Flashback
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 Tuvok experiences a repressed memory that's linked to his first Starfleet assignment under the command of the renowned Captain Sulu.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Chute
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 3 Convicted of a crime they didn't commit, Paris and Kim may spend the rest of their lives in a hellish prison.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Swarm
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 While the crew battles a swarm of alien ships, Kes struggles to stop the Doctor's memory circuits from deteriorating.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - False Profits
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 The crew tries to free the people of the planet Takar from two Ferengi opportunists posing as gods.

programme.title: More Star Trek - More Star Trek

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 13 Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 1 In this special 100th edition of Cold Case Files, we look at the biggest serial murder case in U.S. history; hunt for the Green River Killer. Dave Reichert, the detective who made finding the killer his obsession, walks us through the case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 16 DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Daddy Knows Best/Operation Jambalaya
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 A detective works for 15 years to nab a man who murdered and dismembered his wife to hide the sexual abuse of his children. Then, 20 years after the shooting murder of a gas station attendant, detectives get a lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 16 A police investigator discovers a letter written 16 years earlier that provides clues to a woman's murder. And a firearms expert supplies the evidence that South Carolina authorities need to put a man on trial in 2002 for a murder committed in 1961.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 3 While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 6 The murder of a 73-year-old man leads police on a long chase for a man who's suspected of identity theft and bears a rose tattoo with the name "Phyllis".

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 15 A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 16 A police investigator discovers a letter written 16 years earlier that provides clues to a woman's murder. And a firearms expert supplies the evidence that South Carolina authorities need to put a man on trial in 2002 for a murder committed in 1961.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 17 A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 23 The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 21 Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. And a 26-year-old mother of three disappears on Christmas Eve in 1995, but the missing person case goes cold when police can find few clues

programme.title: Cold Case Files - Cold Case Files
programme.desc: no info available

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Jungle Goddess - Jungle Goddess
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 3 An heiress stranded in Africa is made queen of the jungle in the feature film and Bela Lugosi stars in the short The Phantom Creeps. Joel and the Bots create their own infomercial.

programme.title: MST3K: Pod People - MST3K: Pod People
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A child adopts a large egg which hatches into a mischievous alien, while a group of pop musicians on a wilderness vacation runs into trouble.

programme.title: MST3K: The Skydivers - MST3K: The Skydivers
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The villains of Deep 13 force Mike and the 'bots to watch Why Study Industrial Arts? (1956) and The Skydivers (1963) after challenging them to a swing choir contest.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary - Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: The Crew
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 In part two of the complete history of MST3K, Joel and the rest of the team discuss the Satellite of Love crew.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000 - Horrors of Spider Island
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 11 A group of showgirls washes up on a deserted island after their plane crashes. Soon they discover the island is home to a large, radioactive spider.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary - Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: The Characters
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 In part one of the complete history of MST3K, Joel and the rest of the crew discuss the show's origins and the DIY feel of the early seasons.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary - Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: Big Changes
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 15 Part three of the complete history of MST3K takes a look at the changes the series underwent throughout the course of its run, including the host and network shifts.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Hamlet - Hamlet
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 9 A dour production of Shakespeare’s play produced for German TV. A prince returns home for his father’s funeral and doesn’t like what he finds.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Hercules Unchained - Hercules Unchained
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 8 While trying to resolve a quarrel between warring brothers Eteocles and Polynices, Hercules is taken captive by Queen Omphale of Lydia.

programme.title: MST3K - MST3K
programme.desc: no info available

programme.title: Good Witch - Do the Right Thing
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 Hallmark Original Series. Trouble is brewing after Cassie's mystery guest Ashley goes missing.

programme.title: Love Always, Santa - Love Always, Santa
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 After losing her husband 3 years ago, Celia never thought she'd fall in love again. Now, her world revolves around taking care of her daughter Lilly. Lilly writes a letter to Santa with one wish, for her mom to find love again.

programme.title: The Christmas Parade - The Christmas Parade
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Hallmark Original Movie. Haley, finds a renewed Christmas spirit and unexpected love.

programme.title: A Rose for Christmas - A Rose for Christmas
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Hallmark Original Movie. Andy is a passionate artist whose family has been building Rose Parade floats.

programme.title: Once Upon a Winter's Date - Once Upon a Winter's Date
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Katherine, a workaholic executive, endures the worst Valentine's Day date of her life. On her walk home, a gypsy weaves a magical spell on her and when she wakes up the next morning, she realizes it's Valentine's Day again.

programme.title: A Tale of Two Cities - A Tale of Two Cities
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Based on Charles Dickens' classic, two identical men (both played by Chris Sarandon) - one from England and one from France - fall for the same woman during the height of the French Revolution.

programme.title: Back When We Were Grown Ups - Back When We Were Grown Ups
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Based on Anne Tyler's novel, the movie centers on Rebecca Davitch, a 53-year-old single mother and grandmother, and the cast of her colorful family around her. Stars Blythe Danner.

programme.title: Hallmark Movies & More - Hallmark Movies & More
programme.desc: no info available

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Descent
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 3 The SG-1 team investigates an abandoned Goa'uld ship orbiting the Earth. While they try to salvage the ship, saboteurs attack and the vessel plummets to Earth, deep into the ocean, with O'Neill and his crew trapped inside…and time running out.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Frozen
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 4 An alien that might predate human evolution by 50 million years is discovered in Antarctica and may be part of the race that invented the Stargate. After SG-1 manages to thaw her back to life, they discover she may be the source of a deadly virus.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Nightwalkers
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 5 When a scientist working on stem cell research disappears, Carter, Teal'c and Quinn investigate and discover that the scientist's town is infested with Goa'uld who can only control the citizens by night. Will Carter, Teal'c and Quinn be taken over?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Abyss
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 6 A Goa'uld lord holds O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) captive and tortures him for information about the Tok'ra. As O'Neill suffers, Daniel Jackson (Michael Shanks) appears and offers support. Meanwhile, SG-1 races to O'Neill before it's too late.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Shadow Play
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 7 Quinn is conflicted when a professor from his home planet asks SG-1 to help stage a coup against the Kelownan government in order to stop a civil war. Should SG-1 allow the planet to destroy itself…or are they placing themselves in needless danger?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Other Guys
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 8 Two scientists working on an off-world research project witness SG-1 captured in a Goa'uld raid and attempt to rescue them. Little do they know that SG-1 staged the capture in order to infiltrate the Goa'uld and make contact with a Tok'ra informant.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Allegiance
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 9 The Tok'ra must take refuge from the Goa'uld at the SGC Alpha Site occupied by Jaffa. Bad blood between the races begins to boil as an assassin wreaks havoc on the camp. Can O'Neill stop the bloodshed before the assassin escapes with coordinates?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Cure
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 10 SG-1 visits Pangar, a planet inhabited by humans who have developed a drug that makes their immune systems perfect. Unknown to SG-1 is the means by which the drug is produced, a startling discovery that may hold the key to the origins of the Tok'ra!

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Adrift
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 1 When Atlantis starts shutting down due to a damaged power system, Rodney McKay turns off all non-essential systems. But in just 28 hours, McKay realizes the city’s shields may fail completely and its inhabitants will succumb the vacuum of space.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Lifeline
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 2 Lt. Col. Sheppard leads a daring raid to secure a ZPM that will save Atlantis. When the Replicators become aware of the incursion into their city, Sheppard’s team must keep them at bay or else abandon the mission and their hope of saving Atlantis.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Reunion
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 3 Ronon reconnects with a group of Satedans from his past who enlist the Atlantis team's help on a dangerous mission against the Wraith. But after the Atlantis crew is captured, Ronon is faced with the truth about his old friends’ new loyalties.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Doppelganger
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 4 During an exploratory walk on a jungle planet, Sheppard touches a glowing crystalline growth and becomes host to an infectious energy form. Once on Atlantis, the entity begins to move from person to person, putting the entire crew at risk.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Travelers
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 5 On his way back to Atlantis, Lt. Col. Sheppard is taken prisoner by a rogue ship helmed by a ruthless human commander with a secret agenda. As the team searches for him, Sheppard's resourcefulness is put to the test as he tries to stay alive.

programme.title: Stargate - Stargate
programme.desc: no info available
